Lunchbox as a portable library: Fill the lunchbox with books and turn it into a portable library.
Lunchbox as a portable garden: Fill the lunchbox with soil and seeds and turn it into a portable garden.
Lunchbox as a portable music studio: Turn the lunchbox into a portable music studio by using it as a portable synthesizer or drum set.
Lunchbox as a portable greenhouse: Fill the lunchbox with plants and turn it into a portable greenhouse.
Lunchbox as a portable meditation room: Turn the lunchbox into a portable meditation room by filling it with calming scents and sounds.
